channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. public schools brace for ‘fiscal cliff’ after surge in hiring meets budget shortfalls
item.description: Federal pandemic-era funding masked budget gaps tied to enrollment loss. With that money gone, many U.S. schools are making deep cuts to stay afloat.

item.title: Dow up over 900 points on hope of easing U.S.-China trade tensions — follow live
3M's stock rallies on the company's 'solid game plan' for tariffs
The Dow is up 1,000 points at noon ET. Follow updates here.
Bessent says he expects 'de-escalation' in U.S.-China tariff fight in the 'very near future'
item.description: Stocks, already recovering from the prior day's sell-off, soared higher on news of the remarks from Trump Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.

item.title: GE to keep pushing for zero tariffs, as U.S. aerospace was winning without them
At least 20 feared killed in militant attack on tourists in Indian Kashmir, security sources say
item.description: At least 20 people were feared killed after suspected militants opened fire on tourists in India's Jammu and Kashmir territory on Tuesday, three secur...

item.title: Trump stands 'strongly behind' Hegseth, White House says
item.description: Pete Hegseth is under scrutiny again, after the Defense Secretary reportedly discussed highly sensitive military plans in a Signal chat with his famil...

item.title: 10 ‘pure value’ stocks favored by analysts to soar over the next year
Trump administration proposes major shake-up of U.S. State Department
item.description: The shake-up comes as part of an unprecedented push by Trump and his billionaire adviser Elon Musk to shrink the federal government.
